Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Kevin Bacon did not say "we are blessed" to have Donald Trump as president.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that there is a video of Kevin Bacon saying the statement, when in fact there is none.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or video to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Kevin Bacon expressed praise for Donald Trump, which is not true according to his own tweets.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that it is a fabricated story or hoax, as other similar hoaxes about celebrities praising Trump have been debunked in the past.
